data.comment: 1000 spectators have come along to Spartak Stadium today.
The referee blows his whistle to start the first-half. Dinamo Moscow with the kick-off.
Free kick Dinamo Moscow.
In the minute 1, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Tambov will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Dinamo Moscow.
At Spartak Stadium, Oleksandr Kaplienko has been yellow-carded for the home team.
In the minute 4, In Tambov Dinamo Moscow drive forward through Sebastian Szymanski. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Dinamo Moscow have been awarded a corner by Sergey Karasev.
Tambov have a dangerous throw-in.
Free kick for Tambov in their own half.
In the minute 6, Sebastian Szymanski (Dinamo Moscow) has received a first yellow card.
Sergey Karasev signals a free kick to Dinamo Moscow in their own half.
In the minute 8, Nikolay Komlichenko gets his shot on target but fails to score for Dinamo Moscow.
Goal! Daniil Lesovoy gives Dinamo Moscow a 0-1 lead.
Great play from Daniil Fomin to set up the goal.
In the minute 10, Throw-in for Dinamo Moscow in the half of Tambov.
Ball safe as Tambov is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Dinamo Moscow's Anton Terekhov gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 11, Goal kick for Tambov at Spartak Stadium.
Dinamo Moscow's Nikolay Komlichenko is on target but unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Dinamo Moscow.
In the minute 14, Dinamo Moscow surge into the attack at Spartak Stadium but Roman Evgenievâ€™s header is off-target.
Sergey Karasev awards Tambov a goal kick.
Can Tambov get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Dinamo Moscow's half?
In the minute 15, Anton Terekhov for Dinamo Moscow gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Tambov.
Tambov to take a throw-in in Dinamo Moscow territory.
In the minute 18, Free kick for Dinamo Moscow in the half of Tambov.
Throw-in for Dinamo Moscow close to the penalty box.
Dinamo Moscow's Daniil Fomin breaks free at Spartak Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 19, Ball goes out of play for a Tambov goal kick.
Dinamo Moscow awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Dinamo Moscow's Anton Terekhov gets in a shot on goal at Spartak Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 22, Tambov awarded a free kick in their own half.
Daniil Lesovoy for the away team is judged to be offside.
Daniil Lesovoy for Dinamo Moscow is whistled offside.
In the minute 25, Throw-in for Dinamo Moscow in their own half.
Throw-in for Dinamo Moscow at Spartak Stadium.
In the minute 26, Sergey Karasev signals a Dinamo Moscow throw-in in Tambov's half.
Dmitri Skopintsev returns to the field for Dinamo Moscow after picking up a slight injury.
Sergey Karasev signals a throw-in for Dinamo Moscow, close to Tambov's area.
Sergey Karasev waits before resuming play because Dmitri Skopintsev for Dinamo Moscow is still down.
In the minute 28, Tambov awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in Tambov.
Sergey Karasev awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 30, Can Dinamo Moscow capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Tambov's half?
Dinamo Moscow pushes forward through Sebastian Szymanski, whose finish on goal is saved.
Dinamo Moscow have been awarded a corner by Sergey Karasev.
In the minute 32, Sergey Karasev signals a free kick to Tambov in their own half.
Roman Neustadter (Dinamo Moscow) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Tambov needs to be cautious. Dinamo Moscow have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 34, In Tambov Dinamo Moscow attack through Daniil Fomin. The finish is off target, however.
Tambov have a goal kick.
Free kick for Dinamo Moscow in their own half.
In the minute 35, Throw-in high up the field for Dinamo Moscow in Tambov.
Anton Terekhov for Dinamo Moscow drives towards goal at Spartak Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Can Tambov get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Dinamo Moscow's half?
In the minute 37, Throw-in for Tambov close to the penalty box.
Sebastien Thill is on a sub for Mohammed Rabiu for Tambov.
Sergey Karasev awards Dinamo Moscow a goal kick.
In the minute 38, Throw-in for Tambov in their own half.
Corner awarded to Tambov.
Tambov's German Onugha goes close with his head but his effort is blocked.
In the minute 41, Sergey Karasev signals a free kick to Dinamo Moscow in their own half.
Dinamo Moscow needs to be cautious. Tambov have an attacking throw-in.
Ball goes out of play for a Dinamo Moscow goal kick.
In the minute 43, Free kick for Tambov in their own half.
In Tambov a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Dinamo Moscow awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 44, Anton Kilin (Tambov) gets a yellow card.
Sergey Karasev signals a free kick to Dinamo Moscow.
The fourth official's board shows 1 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in high up the field for Dinamo Moscow in Tambov.
The first-half has come to a close in Tambov.
In the minute 46, Tambov kick-off the second-half u- the match is underway again!
Free kick for Tambov in the half of Dinamo Moscow.
In Tambov Tambov drive forward through Varazdat Haroyan. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 48, Throw-in for Dinamo Moscow in the half of Tambov.
Corner awarded to Tambov.
Sergey Karasev signals a free kick to Dinamo Moscow in their own half.
In the minute 50, Sergey Karasev signals a free kick to Dinamo Moscow.
Tambov awarded a free kick in their own half.
Dinamo Moscow's Anton Terekhov gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 52, It's a goal kick for the home team in Tambov.
Ball safe as Dinamo Moscow is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Sergey Karasev signals a Dinamo Moscow throw-in in Tambov's half.
In the minute 53, Tambov awarded a free kick in their own half.
Red card in Tambov! Anton Kilin has been shown a second yellow card by Sergey Karasev.
Free kick for Dinamo Moscow in their own half.
In the minute 55, Throw-in for Dinamo Moscow at Spartak Stadium.
Sergey Karasev signals a free kick to Tambov in their own half.
Free kick Dinamo Moscow.
In the minute 57, Pavel Karasev for Tambov has been booked by Sergey Karasev and receives a first yellow card.
Guram Tetrashvili (Tambov) is red-carded and dismissed.
Dinamo Moscow make their first substitution with Vladislav Karapuzov replacing Anton Terekhov.
In the minute 61, Dinamo Moscow drives forward and Nikolay Komlichenko gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In Tambov a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Tambov have been awarded a corner by Sergey Karasev.
Tambov have been awarded a penalty...
In the minute 63, At Spartak Stadium, Ivan Ordets for the away team has been yellow-carded. He will miss the next match due to a suspension!
German Onugha levels the score at 1-1 from the penalty spot.
In the minute 66, Dinamo Moscow's Sebastian Szymanski gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Tambov defender.
Throw-in Dinamo Moscow.
In Tambov Dinamo Moscow's Sergey Parshivlyuk is caught offside.
In the minute 68, Vladislav Karapuzov for Dinamo Moscow gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Tambov at Spartak Stadium.
Dinamo Moscow to take a throw-in in Tambov territory.
Tambov have a goal kick.
In the minute 70, Konstantin Tyukavin is replacing Roman Neustadter for Dinamo Moscow at Spartak Stadium.
In the minute 72, Corner awarded to Dinamo Moscow.
Sebastian Szymanski of Dinamo Moscow smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Dinamo Moscow are coming forward and Dmitri Skopintsev gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 73, Goal kick for Tambov at Spartak Stadium.
Dinamo Moscow have been awarded a corner by Sergey Karasev.
In Tambov Dinamo Moscow attack through Sebastian Szymanski. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 74, Sergey Karasev awards Tambov a goal kick.
Free kick for Dinamo Moscow in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Tambov.
In the minute 77, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Sandro Schwarz (Dinamo Moscow) is making a third substitution, with Arsen Zaharyan replacing Dmitri Skopintsev.
Dinamo Moscow drive upfield and Daniil Fomin gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Tambov defender.
In the minute 79, Corner awarded to Dinamo Moscow.
Dinamo Moscow have been awarded a corner by Sergey Karasev.
Sergey Karasev signals a free kick to Tambov in their own half.
In the minute 84, Dinamo Moscow's Sebastian Szymanski gets in a shot on goal at Spartak Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Dinamo Moscow.
Dinamo Moscow have been awarded a corner by Sergey Karasev.
In the minute 87, Sergey Karasev signals a throw-in for Dinamo Moscow, close to Tambov's area.
Corner awarded to Dinamo Moscow.
The home team replace Sebastien Thill with Adessoye Oyewole.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 3 minutes of added time.
An attacking Dinamo Moscow player has been brought down in the area ... It's a penalty!
Can Tambov capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Tambov have been given a penalty at Spartak Stadium...
Tambov are awarded a penalty ... German Onugha botches the spot kick!
Tambov have a dangerous throw-in.
Dinamo Moscow awarded a throw-in in their own half.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 1-2.
Tambov's Evgeni Shlyakov has been booked in Tambov.
Nikolay Komlichenko converts the penalty to give Dinamo Moscow a 1-2 lead.
Nikolay Komlichenko (Dinamo Moscow) has received a yellow card from Sergey Karasev.
